name: 4th International Conference on Tourism Management and Hospitality
content: The 4th International Hospitality and Tourism Management Conference is coming to the beautiful city of Vienna, Austria. Following the success of the inaugural edition, ICTMH 2024 will feature presentations by the worldâ€™s leading academics, who will present their insightful research on a variety of crucial subjects in the field: customer experience, medical tourism, economic sustainability, ICT and tourism, social media marketing, tourism law, and more.
